titles: A new Scotch ballad of Jealous Nanny: or, False-hearted Willy turn'd true: to the tune of, Moggies iealousie.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby in West-Smithfield.,
notes: Verse: "My own dear Nanny, my fair eyne ..."
